ai-mil3.1.9:1.2_0: “Reverend Sir, what are you doing, that you think ‘the skillful and what are skillful?’
ai-mil3.1.9:1.3_0: “Great king, these things are skillful and skillful.”
ai-mil3.1.9:1.5_0: “Great king, all eighteen factors. All the power of ethics is the awakening factors. They develop the faculties of ethical conduct, immersion, wisdom, and freedom. Establishing skillful qualities. The faculty of faith, ethics, immersion, and wisdom. Relying on ethics, immersion, wisdom, and wisdom. Relying on ethics, mindfulness, immersion, and wisdom. They develop the five faculties.”
ai-mil3.1.9:2.2_0: “All the plants and seeds that achieve growth, increase, and maturity do so depending on the earth and grounded on the earth.
ai-mil3.1.9:2.3_0: In the same way, a meditator develops the five faculties depending on ethics, immersion, and wisdom.”
ai-mil3.1.9:3.2_0: “Great king, all the hard work that gets done depends on the earth and is grounded on the earth.
ai-mil3.1.9:3.3_0: In the same way, a meditator develops the five faculties depending on ethics, immersion, and wisdom.”
ai-mil3.1.9:4.2_0: “Great king, if the town wanted to build a fortress first city, he made a hole in the city; then, when the town is deteriorated, he looked at the city, deteriorated, and caused it to forward. Then he added:
ai-mil3.1.9:4.3_0: In the same way, a meditator develops the five faculties depending on ethics, immersion, and wisdom.”
ai-mil3.1.9:5.2_0: “Great king, if the cook is wanting to give the earth to the water, then pull it out, dry it into a pile, and then show it to the ground.
ai-mil3.1.9:5.3_0: In the same way, a meditator develops the five faculties depending on ethics, immersion, and wisdom.
ai-mil3.1.9:7.1_0: This is the ground for living creatures.
ai-mil3.1.9:7.3_0: This is the site of all activities.
ai-mil3.1.9:7.4_0: That which is the worst branches, ~ the guard is the best.’”
